page.title: 02 ABBEYDALE INDUSTRIAL HAMLET
page.content:
The hamlet is just off the A621.The works were built in{1712}and until {1933}scythes and other agricultural edge tools were manufactured using the unique{Crucible Steel}that made the city famous.It is owned by Sheffield City Museums and was opened to the public in {1970. }
There is a boring shop where the scythes were prepared to receive handles.It also has a grinding shop where the scythe blades are sharpened.The clay crucible pots were made in the pot shop,before being sent to the crucible steel furnace where the steel was melted.Also,a tilt forge with two giant hammers for welding the piece of steel between two pieces of iron.
